animeTitle: Megumi to Taiyou: Kajuu Gummi Tweet Love Story
animeDescription: The "Megumi and Taiyou" commercial depicts the reunion of a girl named Megumi (Ai Hashimoto), who was raised near a grape orchard, and her childhood friend Taiyou (Sakuma Kazuyuki).(Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Sequel: Megumi to Taiyou II: Kajuu Gummi Tweet Mystery - Kieta Sapphire Roman no Nazo', 'Other: Choco Kyouju no Oheya']
